html: harvestman gathereth the corn…in the valley of Rephaim. The valley of Rephaim (2 Sam. 5:18), southwest of Jerusalem, was a fertile agricultural area. Isaiah compares the harvest and subsequent emptiness of the valley to Israel's destruction and the few inhabitants that will remain. As the corn is harvested and removed from Rephaim, so will Israel's inhabitants be removed from the land; only a few will remain.
